item.title: Bobbie Jo add a quote by T. S. Eliot
item.description: "We shall not cease from exploration And the end of all our exploring Will be to arrive where we started And know the place for the first time." -- T. S. Eliot

item.title: Bobbie Jo add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "People think it must be fun to be a super genius, but they don't realize how hard it is to put up with all the idiots in the world." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Bobbie Jo add a quote by Bessie Anderson Stanley
Bobbie Jo add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Bobbie Jo add a quote by Khalil Gibran
item.description: "And forget not that the earth delights to feel your bare feet and the winds long to play with your hair" -- Khalil Gibran

item.title: Bobbie Jo add a quote by John Muir
item.description: "The clearest way into the Universe is through a forest wilderness." -- John Muir

item.title: Bobbie Jo add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description: "What's the use of a fine house if you haven't got a tolerable planet to put it on?" -- Henry David Thoreau

item.title: Bobbie Jo add a quote by Charlemagne
item.description: "To have another language is to possess a second soul." -- Charlemagne

item.title: Bobbie Jo add a quote by Victor Hugo
item.description: "He never went out without a book under his arm, and he often came back with two." -- Victor Hugo

item.title: Bobbie Jo add a quote by Victor Hugo
item.description: "To love another person is to see the face of God." -- Victor Hugo

item.title: Bobbie Jo add a quote by Victor Hugo
item.description: "It is nothing to die. It is frightful not to live." -- Victor Hugo

item.title: Bobbie Jo add a quote by Hugo, Victor
item.description: "Not being heard is no reason for silence." -- Hugo, Victor

item.title: Bobbie Jo add a quote by Victor Hugo
item.description: "There is nothing like a dream to create the future." -- Victor Hugo

item.title: Bobbie Jo add a quote by Victor Hugo
item.description: "I have been loving you a little more every minute since this morning." -- Victor Hugo

item.title: Bobbie Jo add a quote by Victor Hugo
item.description: "To err is human. To loaf is Parisian." -- Victor Hugo
